name: Crystal Protector
description:
Pendulum Effect
 Each turn, the first "Crystal Beast" card(s), "Ultimate Crystal God" monster(s), "Rainbow Dragon(s)", and/or "Rainbow Dark Dragon(s)" you control that would be destroyed by a card effect, is not destroyed.

 Monster Effect
 During damage calculation, if your "Crystal Beast" monster battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; your battling monster's ATK/DEF each become double its original ATK/DEF during that damage calculation only, but it is destroyed at the end of this Damage Step.
